ch0182_00_ilima/0101_0701_01_10:
How are your adventures on Pasio going,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0182_00_ilima/0101_0701_02_10:
May the future bring you and your partner
Pokémon happiness!
ch0182_00_ilima/7101_0701_01_10:
In my role as captain, I just want to do my part
to make everyone shine!
ch0182_00_ilima/7101_0701_02_10: Clearing a trial is no easy feat.
ch0182_00_ilima/7101_0701_03_10:
That’s why those who’ve overcome trials and
seized the future beyond seem to shine!
ch0182_00_ilima/7102_0701_01_10: I once got mixed up in a mysterious incident.
ch0182_00_ilima/7102_0701_02_10:
What happened was a Nugget of mine vanished,
although I had hidden it carefully, deep in the back
of my bookshelves...
ch0182_00_ilima/7102_0701_03_10: However, I had my suspicions on the culprit...
ch0182_00_ilima/7102_0701_04_10:
...and so I apprehended some Hypno who’d been
loitering around my home.
ch0182_00_ilima/7103_0701_01_10: Pokémon have a variety of types.
ch0182_00_ilima/7103_0701_02_10:
Like Electric and Rock, for example. Each type has
unique qualities that can heavily impact your
strategies in battle.
ch0182_00_ilima/7103_0701_03_10: Do you have a type you’re particularly fond of?
ch0182_00_ilima/7103_0701_04_10: If so...I hope you stick to it.
ch0182_00_ilima/7104_0701_01_10: I love to run simulations of battle strategies.
ch0182_00_ilima/7104_0701_02_10:
I can only know a strategy of mine is good or bad
by putting it into practice.
ch0182_00_ilima/7104_0701_03_10:
The battle data I gain becomes wisdom I can draw
from when forming new tactics.
ch0182_00_ilima/7105_0701_01_10:
Whenever Trainers undertake my trial, the first
thing I recommend is that they fill out their team.
ch0182_00_ilima/7105_0701_02_10:
After all, having reliable friends by your side can
lead to success in the trial.
ch0182_00_ilima/7105_0701_03_10:
So it’d make me happy to become a reliable friend
of yours, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0182_00_ilima/1701_0701_01_10: This is a present from me. Do you accept?
ch0182_00_ilima/1701_0702_01_10: May fortune favor you on your adventure!
ch0182_00_ilima/2501_0701_01_10:
I’ve traveled the world since I was young with my
mother, who was an actress on the stage.
ch0182_00_ilima/2501_0701_02_10: In doing so, I came to realize something.
ch0182_00_ilima/2501_0701_03_10:
I realized how beautiful my mother was when she
dedicated herself completely to the role she was
playing onstage...
ch0182_00_ilima/2501_0701_04_10:
Yes, it is moving to see such complete
dedication—to anything!
ch0182_00_ilima/2501_0702_01_10:
The reason you seem to shine must be your
dedication to Pokémon,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0182_00_ilima/2501_0702_02_10:
The sight of you and your partner giving it your all
grips my heart and refuses to let go.
ch0182_00_ilima/2511_0701_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ], have you ever heard
of an item in Alola called an Everstone?
ch0182_00_ilima/2511_0701_02_10:
You don’t tend to see them on Pasio, but when a
Pokémon holds an Everstone, it will not evolve.
ch0182_00_ilima/2511_0701_03_10:
Choosing to evolve or not can be part of one’s
strategy.
ch0182_00_ilima/2511_0702_01_10:
You can intentionally choose not to evolve a
Pokémon.
ch0182_00_ilima/2511_0702_02_10:
At times, doing so can even lead to positive
results.
ch0182_00_ilima/2511_0702_03_10: May our friendship last as long as an Everstone.
ch0182_00_ilima/3001_0701_01_10:
Captain magic! Ahh, I feel so much sharper in the
morning when I shout that out loud.
ch0182_00_ilima/3003_0701_01_10:
I love making my teammates shine when we
battle together. It’s what my partner and I
do best!
ch0182_00_ilima/3005_0701_01_10:
Wow, is it night already? My Pokémon and I were
just simulating some new battle plans... I didn’t
realize it was this late!
